channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Opinion: A royal seal of approval
item.description: The Prince and Princess of Wales will join the King and Queen in granting Royal Warrants — a sort of "seal of approval" — on certain goods and services.
item.content:encoded:
The Prince and Princess of Wales will join the King and Queen in granting Royal Warrants — a sort of "seal of approval" — on certain goods and services.

(Image credit: Leon Neal/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Scott Simon

item.title: Ukraine says it struck a Russian airbase as Russia sent drones into Ukraine
item.description: Ukraine said it struck a Russian airbase on Saturday, while Russia continued to pound Ukraine with hundreds of drones overnight, dashing hopes for a breakthrough in efforts to end the war.
item.content:encoded:
Ukraine said it struck a Russian airbase on Saturday, while Russia continued to pound Ukraine with hundreds of drones overnight, dashing hopes for a breakthrough in efforts to end the war.

(Image credit: Ukrainian Emergency Service)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Will Trump's megabill help Democrats win the House?
item.description: Democrats feel that Trump's tax and spending bill gives them an opening ahead of the 2026 midterms. But if they want to win back the House, they're going to have to get their own house in order first.
item.content:encoded:
Democrats feel that Trump's tax and spending bill gives them an opening ahead of the 2026 midterms. But if they want to win back the House, they're going to have to get their own house in order first.

(Image credit: Demetrius Freeman)
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: 'Buy now, pay later' purchases can now affect your credit score. Here's what that means
item.description: Services that split up payments into installments are increasingly popular, especially among young and low-to-middle income shoppers. But now the FICO credit scoring company will be tracking that debt.
item.content:encoded:
Services that split up payments into installments are increasingly popular, especially among young and low-to-middle income shoppers. But now the FICO credit scoring company will be tracking that debt.

(Image credit: Justin Sullivan)
item.dc:creator: Laurel Wamsley

item.title: At least 24 dead in catastrophic Texas flooding. Rescue efforts underway
item.description: At least 24 people are dead following flooding that slammed Texas Hill Country overnight on Friday, according to officials. At least 20 girls from a summer camp remain missing.
item.content:encoded:
At least 24 people are dead following flooding that slammed Texas Hill Country overnight on Friday, according to officials. At least 20 girls from a summer camp remain missing.

(Image credit: Michel Fortier)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán

item.title: Adult education programs in limbo as Trump administration withholds grant funds
item.description: The Trump administration is withholding $715 million for adult funding nationwide. This has left programs that serve over a million students a year scrambling for answers.
item.content:encoded: The Trump administration is withholding $715 million for adult funding nationwide. This has left programs that serve over a million students a year scrambling for answers.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Asch

item.title: Medicaid's many different names may cause confusion about who's losing coverage
item.description: Medicaid programs go by so many different names across the country that advocates and experts warn people may not know they're losing their coverage until it's too late.
item.content:encoded: Medicaid programs go by so many different names across the country that advocates and experts warn people may not know they're losing their coverage until it's too late.
item.dc:creator: Abigail Ruhman

item.title: Trump says ceasefire deal is near as Israeli strikes kill 138 Palestinians in Gaza
item.description: More than 60 of those killed were waiting for aid, according to Palestinian health officials. President Trump said Friday that talks over a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas are at a crucial stage.
item.content:encoded:
More than 60 of those killed were waiting for aid, according to Palestinian health officials. President Trump said Friday that talks over a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas are at a crucial stage.

(Image credit: Anas Baba)
item.dc:creator: Anas Baba

item.title: President Trump says he wants to stage UFC fight on White House grounds
item.description: President Trump has announced that an Ultimate Fighting Championship bout will be held on the grounds of the White House next year, one of many events to be held to celebrate America's 250th birthday.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump has announced that an Ultimate Fighting Championship bout will be held on the grounds of the White House next year, one of many events to be held to celebrate America's 250th birthday.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: Jackie Northam

item.title: Russia hits Ukraine with largest aerial attack as Trump talks to Zelenskyy and Putin
item.description: Russian missiles and drones hammered Kyiv in an overnight attack, the largest aerial assault on the Ukrainian capital since the war began more than three years ago.
item.content:encoded:
Russian missiles and drones hammered Kyiv in an overnight attack, the largest aerial assault on the Ukrainian capital since the war began more than three years ago.

(Image credit: Yehor Konovalov)
item.dc:creator: Jackie Northam
